data.name: Void Elf
data.description:
Void Elf

Units:
+5% evasion
-12% damage
-10% hit points

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage

Traits: High risk - high reward. Very strong and versatile race with utterly limitless potential. Tap into the void to unleash its unfathomable power. That is, if you think you can handle the voices in your head.

Dificulty: Expert

auras.name: Void Grip Aura
auras.description:
-25% unit move speed
(does not affect Special unit)
(2000 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Void Grip Aura
auras.description:
-10% unit attack rate
(affects non-Hero units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Void Grip Aura
auras.description:
-15% unit attack and move speed
(does not affect Special unit)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Void Mastery [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Void Form

Reduces spell damage to Ranger, Arcanist, Sorceress and Vanguard by 25%. Increases their hit point regeneration by 3 HP/s.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Anti Magus [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Shadow Blades

Anti Magus replaces Ranger
Melee Unit
-10% attack rate
+2 armor
+25 HP
Abilities:
Silence (Disable Spell)
(silences for 15 sec in 150 AoE)
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
Spell Steal (Disable Spell)
(steals buffs from units)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Upgrades used:
Shadowsteel Weapons
Shadowsteel Armor
Shadow Blades
Phantom Image
Void Form
Void Implosion

Type: Anti buff

units.name: Anti Magus
units.description:
Melee Unit
Strong Vs Ranged Unit
Weak Vs Spellcaster

Siege Unit
+6 damage
+50 HP

(-10% attack rate in 400 AoE)
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Shadowsteel Weapons
Shadowsteel Armor
Void Form
Dark Naaru's Shield
Void Implosion

Type: Mid Game Push

bonuses.name: Void Rifts [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Void Implosion

Open the Void portal and good things will happen. Great things will happen. Just open the portal.

Type: Trolling

bonuses.name: Arcane Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Arcane Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [C]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Special Unit.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Strength Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Agility Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Special Unit.

bonuses.name: Anti-Magic Shield [C]
bonuses.description:

Has Global Silence and Mana Leak Aura.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Anti-Magic Shield
spells.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Global Silence (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Silences enemy units and structures for 10 sec.
(does not affect Special unit)
Cooldown: 180 seconds.

spells.name: Mana Leak Aura
spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+15% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

towerUpgrades.name: Shadow Blades
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and mana burn
Affects: Ranger
(burns half amount to Heroes)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +4 damage, burns 4 mana
Lv2: +8 damage, burns 8 mana
Lv3: +12 damage, burns 12 mana
Lv4: +16 damage, burns 16 mana

towerUpgrades.name: Phantom Image
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to create illusions
Affects: Ranger

Lv1: last 10 sec, take 500% damage
Lv2: last 20 sec, take 400% damage
Lv3: last 30 sec, take 300% damage
Lv4: last 40 sec, take 200% damage

towerUpgrades.name: Void Whispers
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to stun units
Affects: Sorceress
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: disorientates for 0.5 sec
Lv2: disorientates for 0.75 sec
Lv3: disorientates for 1 sec
Lv4: disorientates for 1.25 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Void Form
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: invulnerability and move speed
Affects: Ranger and Vanguard

Lv1: 2.5 sec invulnerability, 3 sec speed
Lv2: 2.75 sec invulnerability, 3.5 sec speed
Lv3: 3 sec invulnerability, 4 sec speed
Lv4: 3.25 sec invulnerability, 4.5 sec speed

towerUpgrades.name: Dark Naaru's Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor and damage return
Affects: Vanguard and Arcanist

Lv1: +2 armor, 10 damage to melee attacker
Lv2: +4 armor, 20 damage to melee attacker
Lv3: +6 armor, 30 damage to melee attacker
Lv4: +8 armor, 40 damage to melee attacker

towerUpgrades.name: Void Arcanist
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Ray of Disruption (dispels buffs)
can hit up to 2/3/4/5 units
Lv2: has Veil Tear (damages spellcasters)
1x dmg/MP spent, lasts 30/45/60 sec
Lv3: has Nether Blast (deals damage)
80/120 damage in 150 AoE
Lv4: has Psionic Shield (bonus armor)
+50 armor for 6 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Hysteria
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces target's attack rate
Affects: Void Drake and Sentry Tower
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: -10% attack rate for 10 sec
Lv2: -20% attack rate for 12 sec
Lv3: -30% attack rate for 14 sec
Lv4: -40% attack rate for 16 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Ricochet
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and bouncing projectyles
Affects: Arcanist and Glaive Thrower
(20% damage loss per bounce)
(does not affect buildings)

Lv1: +10% attack rate, 1 bounce
Lv2: +20% attack rate, 2 bounces
Lv3: +30% attack rate, 3 bounces
Lv4: +40% attack rate, 4 bounces

towerUpgrades.name: Void Implosion
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage upon death
Affects: All ground units
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 10 damage in 150 AoE
Lv2: 20 damage in 150 AoE
Lv3: 30 damage in 150 AoE
Lv4: 40 damage in 150 AoE

t1spell.name: Arrow Voley [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Void Wisps [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends swarm of void spirits.
Each wisp deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

fort.name: Meditation Shrine (Lv1)
fort.description:
Units:
+10% attack rate
+5% evasion
-12% damage
-10% hit points

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage

Traits: Glass cannons. Extremely weak starting units. Very fragile even in late game. Heavily relies on special upgrades inside towers. Delivers short outbursts of damage. Strong against buff dependent races.

Dificulty: Expert

skills.name: Arrow Voley [Z]
skills.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

skills.name: Void Wisps [X]
skills.description:
Sends swarm of void spirits.
Each wisp deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.description:
Units:
+5% evasion
-12% damage
-10% hit points

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage

Traits: High risk - high reward. Very strong and versatile race with utterly limitless potential. Tap into the void to unleash its unfathomable power. That is, if you think you can handle the voices in your head.

Dificulty: Expert

skills.name: Sacrifice Ritual [C]
skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

skills.name: Hysteria (Lv1)
skills.description:
Slows attack rate by 10% for 10 sec.

(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

barrack.name: Way Gate (Lv2)
barrack.description:
Gives:
Can train Heroes
+750 hit points
+2 armor
+7% unit spawning rate
+1 Melee Unit
+2 Siege Units

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:
Restores 100 HP over 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: Phantom Warrior
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Void Form (Self Spell)
2.5-4 sec invulnerability
(+300% move speed)

Shadow Orb (Orb Effect)
18-30% lifesteal, 20 mana burn
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Nether Shroud (Damage Spell)
10-22 damage/sec
(300-600 area of effect)
(doesn't affect buildings)

Greatsword (Self Spell)
+150 damage for 20-30 sec

heroes.name: Void Ranger
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Hybrid (Nuker/Disabler)

Can learn:
Power Shot (Disable Spell)
200-500 damage, 3-6 sec stun
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Shadow Arrows (Orb Effect)
30-90 damage on unit kill
(150-300 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Void's Grip (Disable mini Aura)
14-20% AS, 28-40% MS reduction
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Rapidshot (Self Spell)
200-300% attack rate bonus
(takes 50% extra damage)

heroes.name: Void Sorcerer
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Hybrid (Nuker/Disabler)

Can learn:
Void Wave (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)

Void Grasp (Disable Spell)
300 damage, 5-8 sec stun
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Phantom Double (Self Spell)
creates illusion for 3-6 sec

Void Portal (Summoning Spell)
Relax... I got this!
What could go wrong?

heroes.name: Dark Naaru
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Void Grasp (Disable Spell)
14-26 second stun
(550-700 area of effect)

Nether Beams (Passive Skill)
launches 1-7 beams at units

Intimidation Aura (Disable Aura)
10-22% attack rate reduction
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Void Wisps (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage
(750-900 area of effect)
